List of third party libraries used by the engine:


- GLFW                   (C language)
 https://www.glfw.org/

- GLAD OpenGL API loader  (C language)
 https://glad.dav1d.de/

- cgltf  (models format)  (C language)
 https://github.com/jkuhlmann/cgltf

- JSON reader/writer (C language)
 https://github.com/zserge/jsmn
 
- STB: STB Image load/save  (C language)
https://github.com/nothings/stb
